About Redtail Appraisals (Rebekah Assid)

Redtail Appraisals (Rebekah Assid) provides professional art appraisal services in Savannah. With expertise in fine art, decorative arts, antiques, luxury goods, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.
